summary:
Objective: 
To obtain a full time position working in a rewarding position in a Long Term Care industry utilizing my experience and talents to enhance the quality of life for all residents, families and staff.

currentPositions.description:
11/6/2012 – present 
	
Director of Life Enrichment/Activities
	Responsible for all documentation, MDS 3.0, Assessment, Progress notes, POC, IDT
	Versed in Visions and PCC programs
 Create Newsletters and monthly calendars 
	Raised a total of $7,500.00 for facilities fund raiser for MS, abused children, Alzheimer walk, abused animals and Wounded Heroes 
	Established professional relationship with Baldwin Wallace College and pioneered a program for Psychology Majors to complete their internship with our facility
	Created and implemented the Ten Step Program /Life Enrichment Program which empowers and enhances the self worth of the residents by giving them responsibility for jobs and light duties within the facility
	Successfully created ( The Star Program) behavioral programs for our two locked units, brought behaviors down by 60% and brought participation up by 70% @ this time
	Initiated and maintain facility store which has brought in an additional average of $ 600-$800.00 month profit
	Replaced all games, art supplies and purchased touch screen games, slot machine, and basketball unit for residents to utilize and more.
	Joined with , Angel Sending Hope a writing Program for Residents to 
 Make and send letters of support to family suffering from disasters illness and death.
	Created a Reiki/Aroma Therapy room for residents, families and staff
	Developed “Pick of the Month Program” which allows residents to recognize outstanding staff members 
	Head of Volunteer Program which has brought in over 40 volunteers from the community, local churches, schools and three pet therapy dogs
	Initiated and maintain quarterly meetings with Activities Directors/Life Enrichment from sister facilities, head up 13 buildings at this time
	Created and run the Buddy up program, where our facility buddies up with other facilities and take resident to different events and lunches.

currentPositions.title: Director of Life Enrichment/Activities/Volunteers

projects.title: 	Involved with several non-profit groups, Co-Chaired Bloodview Haunted House which has raised over 3 Million to date 	President and Founder of a 501-C3 Non Profit, Raised 65,000.00 for schools and local Communities

headline: Director of Life Enrichment/Activities LTC

ingestedContentSummary.description: Experience LIFE's visual record of the 20th century by exploring the most iconic photographs from one of the most famous private photo collections in the world.
ingestedContentSummary.title: The Most Iconic Photographs of All Time - LIFE

message.text: #AwayOutHub was a great experience. We got a lot of rejections and my girl @vanessacecil  got cursed out, but if we hit one out of 100 we did good ! I think we did to #God bless anybody interest in #helping people get out of that lifestyle #drugs #prostitution, #Traffing whatever the case may be look us up, #exitTheLife.com Check out this site guys. We need some help we're gonna be opening up more Hobbs join us. Let's pull together and help out these #people and these #kids.#833-599-3733

commentary.text: Good luck with your new role!
